timeline.message:
add git-commit-id-maven-plugin, read generated git.properties file,
and expose webservice git commit info (ID and build version) using metadata/config endpoint

timeline.bodyText: should probably be debug (its a judgement call, but for me this message will always be shown and doesn't do anything aside from telling you where you are ... might even be trace)
